devices.description: This device can control the switch of the living room lights and adjust the brightness and color of the living room lights(options: Warm White, Cool White, Orange).
This device can control the power switch, channel(options: CCTV, Shanghai TV, Beijing TV, Jiangxi TV, Hunan TV, Zhejiang TV, Jiangsu TV) and volume of the living room television.
This device can control the audio player in the living room to adjust the volume, play and stop music(options: 晴天, 稻香, 我记得, 程艾影, 干杯, 我怀念的, 知我, 上里与手抄卷).
This device can control the opening and closing of the curtains in the living room and adjust their position(options: 0-100, 0: fully closed, 100: fully open).
This device can control the air conditioner switch in the living room, set the temperature and mode(options: cooling, heating, fan).
This device can turn on/off the air purifier in the living room, and adjust the purification level (options: low, medium, high, auto).
This device can turn on/off the humidifier in the living room, and set the humidity level (options: 20-80).
This device can control the opening and closing of the windows in the living room and adjust their position(options: 0-100, 0: fully closed, 100: fully open).
This device can control the switch of the master_bedroom lights and adjust the brightness and color of the master_bedroom lights(options: Warm White, Cool White, Orange).
This device can control the air conditioner switch in the master bedroom, set the temperature and mode(options: cooling, heating, fan).
This device can control the opening and closing of the curtains in the master bedroom and adjust their position(options: 0-100, 0: fully closed, 100: fully open).
This device can turn on/off the air purifier in the master bedroom, and adjust the purification level (options: low, medium, high, auto).
This device can turn on/off the humidifier in the master bedroom, and set the humidity level (options: 40%, 50%, 60%).
This device can control the opening and closing of the windows in the master bedroom and adjust their position(options: 0-100, 0: fully closed, 100: fully open).
This device can control the switch of the guest bedroom lights and adjust the brightness and color of the guest_bedroom lights(options: Warm White, Cool White, Orange).
This device can control the air conditioner switch in the guest badroom, set the temperature and mode(options: cooling, heating, fan).
This device can control the opening and closing of the curtains in the guest bedroom and adjust their position(options: 0-100, 0: fully closed, 100: fully open).
This device can control the opening and closing of the windows in the guest bedroom and adjust their position(options: 0-100, 0: fully closed, 100: fully open).
This device can control the switch of the kitchen lights and adjust the brightness and color of the kitchen lights(options: Warm White, Cool White, Orange).
This device can control the range hood in the kitchen, including power and set speed (options: low, medium, high).
This device can control the opening and closing of the windows in the kitchen and adjust their position(options: 0-100, 0: fully closed, 100: fully open).
This device can control the switch of the bathroom lights and adjust the brightness and color of the bathroom lights(options: Warm White, Cool White, Orange).
This device can control the switch of ventilation fan in the bathroom and set speed (options: high, medium, low).
This device can control the bathroom heater, including power and temperature level (options: low, medium, high).
